translations: adj.选举的，由选举产生的；可选择的；有选举权的

phrs.translation: 选择性外科手术；非急需施行的手术

sentences.sentence: Buchanan has never held elective office.
sentences.translation: 布坎南从未担任过选任职位。

sentences.sentence: Most of the students of our class take Japanese as an elective course.
sentences.translation: 我们班大部分同学选修日语。

sentences.sentence: To learn more about Chinese culture, Jack has decided to take Chinese folk music as an elective course.
sentences.translation: 为了更多地了解中国文化，杰克决定选修中国民间音乐。
